article_title: Candidate talks issues with tribes, unions in private

og.description: HIBBING — Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders held two private meetings with local steelworkers and tribes Friday prior to a rally at Hibbing High School.
og.title: Candidate talks issues with tribes, unions in private
